edge: The song 'Bhoot Hoon Main' has a remixed version in the movie's soundtrack.
Both 'Bhoot Hai Yahan Koi' (original) and 'Dead But Not Asleep' are songs in the movie's soundtrack.
The original version of 'Bhoot Hai Yahan Koi' is also included in the movie's soundtrack.
The song 'Ghor Andhere' plays during the ending credits of the movie.
Singer Asha Bhosle lends her voice to both 'Bhoot Hai Yahan Koi' and 'Dead But Not Asleep'.
Singer Clinton Cerejo contributes to the song 'Ghor Andhere'.
Vocalist Sunidhi Chauhan is featured in both 'Bhoot Hoon Main' and its remixed version.
Musician Salim Merchant is involved in the creation of both 'Ghor Andhere' and the original version of 'Bhoot Hai Yahan Koi'.
'Yeh Sard' is an instrumental track in the movie's soundtrack.
